#/****************************************************
# * test_all
# * 2024-05-08 22:37:24
# * Generated by rpc framework makeService.py
#****************************************************/
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(test_all)  # 请替换成你的项目名称

set(PATH_PROJECT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_all)
# 添加头文件搜索路径
include_directories(
    /usr/local/include/rpc
    ${PATH_PROJECT}
)
# 添加链接库搜索路径
link_directories(/usr/local/lib/ ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib)

link_libraries(
    mircorpc
    tinyxml
    )

file(GLOB SOURCES  
${PATH_PROJECT}/common/*.cc
${PATH_PROJECT}/interface/*.cc
${PATH_PROJECT}/pb/*.cc
${PATH_PROJECT}/service/*.cc
)

set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${PATH_PROJECT}/../lib)
add_library(interfaceService SHARED ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(interfaceService protobuf)


set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${PATH_PROJECT}/../bin)

add_executable( test_all  ${PATH_PROJECT}/../main.cc)
target_link_libraries( test_all protobuf interfaceService)

add_subdirectory(test_client)
